sense.def:
To assure someone that something is true or will happen
pomeni nekemu človeku povedati, da je nekaj vsekakor res ali se bo zgodilo, da bi mu olajšali skrbi.

seg.quote: Kurt assured me that he was an excellent climber.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ
or
"of"

sense.def:
To be assured of something
pomeni, da bomo tisto vsekakor dobili.

seg.quote: This film had assured him a place in movie history.
